Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the commissioner of the office of emergency management to review or update plans for responding to certain emergency events and to report to the council thereon.
Items.MatterName: Requiring the commissioner of the office of emergency management to review or update plans for responding to certain emergency events and to report to the council thereon.

Items.Title: Oversight – Reviewing the City’s Hurricane Sandy After Action Report and Recommendations.
Items.MatterName: Oversight – Reviewing the City’s Hurricane Sandy After Action Report and Recommendations.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a community recovery plan to respond to certain emergency events.
Items.MatterName: Creation of a community recovery plan to respond to emergency conditions.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the creation of an outreach and recovery plan to assist vulnerable and homebound individuals before, during and after certain emergency events.
Items.MatterName: Creation of an outreach and recovery plan to assist vulnerable and homebound individuals before, during and after emergency conditions.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the evacuation of persons with special medical needs during and after emergency conditions.
Items.MatterName: Evacuation of persons with special medical needs during and after emergency conditions.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to special medical needs shelters operated during and after certain emergency events.
Items.MatterName: Tracking of persons with special medical needs during and after emergency conditions.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a food and water access plan in response to certain emergency events.
Items.MatterName: A food and water access plan in response to certain emergency events.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a sheltering plan in response to certain emergency events.
Items.MatterName: Sheltering plan in response to certain emergency events.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a small business and non-profit organization recovery plan in response to emergency events.
Items.MatterName: Small business and non-profit organization recovery plan in response to emergency events.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a fuel management plan in response to certain emergency events.
Items.MatterName: Fuel management plan in response to certain emergency events.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a traffic management plan in response to certain emergency events.
Items.MatterName: Traffic management plan in response to certain emergency events.
